citations.narrative:
This facility is conducting regulated activity without a USDA license. The facility is exhibiting 28 white-tail deer to the
public without a USDA license. The facility requires a USDA license for exhibiting white-tail deer to the public. No
regulated activity is permitted without a valid USDA license.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
This facility is conducting regulated activity without a USDA license. The facility is exhibiting 28 white-tail deer to the 
public without a USDA license.  The facility requires a USDA license for exhibiting white-tail deer to the public.  No 
regulated activity is permitted without a valid USDA license. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
